ul.li: The bad old native CORBA implementation is replaced with a protocol based on PostgreSQL`s frontend-backend (febe) protocol. The new implementation is more easy to develop, it is faster and more relyable.
Build: maven. The old ant build system was replaced with maven.
Default container system: Merlin instead of Phoenix. The Avalon team decided to stop the developement of Phoenix, and go on with merlin. Hopefully Merlin will be soon as fullfeatured as phoenix was.
